footer.disclaimer: This frontend is hosted decentrally on IPFS (InterPlanetary File System). It serves to visualise the blockchain data and help users interact with the Overtime contracts that belong to Thales DAO. By doing so it helps users understand the risks of using those smart contracts and what the specific interactions entail. The frontend does not facilitate anything else apart from interacting with those contracts in a visually comprehensive way. In doing so, it is no different than the functionality provided by Etherscan or RPCs (Remote Procedure Calls). The frontend itself does not belong to Thales DAO or any individual. It stores no user data and has no dedicated backend or database. All code is uploaded statically directly to the IPFS. Just as the blockchain does no geo-fencing and no KYC, neither can this frontend do so. However, by interacting with Thales DAO contracts, you commit to have read, understood and accepted <disclaimer>Thales DAO’s terms of use</disclaimer> and you take full liability in case you have not adhered to those terms. Thales DAO uses the decentralised sUSD token as collateral for all its transactions. In doing so it inherits all the usage rules from Synthetix DAO with regards to collateral and does not introduce its own.To get familiar with Overtime rules and trading guidelines, please visit the <guidelines>Sports Trading Guidelines page</guidelines> in the Overtime docs.

market.skew-tooltip: Skew Impact is the amount of premium added to a position price based on current risk the AMM incurs from this specific market.

profile.voucher-info:
Overtime vouchers are NFTs that can be minted in Optimism or Arbitrum and can be used as collateral for taking positions into its corresponding chain.

In this page you can claim your outstanding vouchers from different campaigns. Once you claim your voucher you can use it in the Overtime platform or transfer it (as a gift, for example) to someone else (after all, it's an NFT!). Once the voucher is used as collateral in the platform it'll dissapear from your wallet.

You can read more about Overtime vouchers in the documentation.
profile.winnings-are-forfeit: *Winnings not claimed within {{amount}} days of a market being resolved are forfeit.

markets.zero-odds-tooltip: Sports AMM only offers liquidity in the price range of $0.05 to $0.95. Effectively this means that if the odds for a position are less than 5% or more than 95%, that position wont have liquidity.
markets.incentivized-tooltip: 15,000 OP and 20,000 ARB during the NBA Playoffs! Check more details <detailsLink>here</detailsLink>.
markets.incentivized-tooltip-tennis: A total of {{rewards}} will be distributed during the Australian Open. Check more details <detailsLink>here</detailsLink>.
markets.incentivized-tooltip-nfl-playoffs: A whopping total of {{rewards}} will be distributed for the NFL Superbowl. Only volume on Arbitrum network will be calculated towards rewards! Check more details <detailsLink>here</detailsLink>.
markets.incentivized-tooltip-uefa: A whopping total of {{rewards}} will be distributed for the UEFA competitions. Only volume on Arbitrum network will be calculated towards rewards! Check more details <detailsLink>here</detailsLink>.
markets.incentivized-tooltip-nhl-mlb: A whopping total of {{rewards}} will be distributed for the rest of the {{league}} season, including the playoffs. Only volume on Arbitrum network will be calculated towards rewards! Check more details <detailsLink>here</detailsLink>.
markets.incentivized-tooltip-euro-copa: A whopping total of {{rewards}} will be distributed for the Euro 2024 and Copa America competitions. Check more details <detailsLink>here</detailsLink>.
markets.incentivized-tooltip-wimbledon: Compete for {{rewards}} during Wimbledon 2024 on Overtime V1 and V2. Check more details <detailsLink>here</detailsLink>.

rewards.description:
A total of 8,000 OP and 8,000 Thales will be distributed bi-weekly on a continuous basis as per TIP-96 to offset fees paid to the safebox contracts.
The leaderboard will calculate rewards as 90% rebate of the SafeBox fee, which is 1% for singles and 2% for parlays of total amount paid.
The $ value of OP and THALES will be calculated using a 7 days twap at the start of the period. If at the end of the two weeks period the total rebates end up being more than the initial twap value of OP and THALES tokens, the rebate will be reduced proportionally for every trader.
rewards.parlay-link: For the OP monthly parlay competition click here.
rewards.op-rewards-banner-message: OP rewards have started, check how you can earn those on <bold>the OP rewards page</bold>

quiz.title: Sports Trivia competition
quiz.start-quiz-description:
Hey sports fans! Ready to test your knowledge and beat the field?

Overtime has launched a sports trivia competition. The trivia is available to everyone to test their knowledge and compete.

Connect your wallet and enter your Twitter handle to start the trivia! For any questions please join our Discord.

leaderboard.title: Trivia Leaderboard
leaderboard.description:
This is the trivia leaderboard where you can see how are you faring against the competition.

You can take the trivia as many times as you like here.

quiz.help-us-improve-tooltip: Help us improve sports trivia by adding new questions to the questions database.

finish-messages.rank-info: With {{points}} {{pointsLabel}} you are ranked {{rank}} out of {{totalParticipants}} participants.

landing-page.best-odds: Join the Web3 sports markets revolution
landing-page.info-text-1: You don’t need to create an user. We don't gather any kind of personal information either.
landing-page.info-text-2: When centralized entities are falling, transparency is key. All our code is public and the smart contracts can be reviewed by anyone
landing-page.info-text-3: There’s no one holding your collateral. Your keys, your tokens.
landing-page.info-text-4: Industry-leader provides tamper-proof odds and sport matches result in a decentralized way.
landing-page.info-text-5: Every interaction with Overtime sports AMM is done on Optimism network, leader in scalability.
landing-page.join-discord: Need any help? Join our discord

referral.no-result: There are no results for this table
referral.paragraph:
Overtime Referrals Program is an on-chain incentivized user acquisition and onboarding tool.The program allows anyone to generate a Referral Link and share it with users they are trying to onboard.

When sharing your personal Referral Link, you earn 0.5% of all {{ collateralKey }} volume your referred users produce! There are no manual claims needed, the {{ collateralKey }} is auto-accruing in your wallet in form of simple {{ collateralKey }} transfers.

description.exchange: Overtime uses popular stablecoins (Crypto USD) to execute trades. By clicking on Exchange to {{collateral}} button, seamlessly swap ETH to a desired amount of stablecoins.
description.trade: Now you are funded and ready to use Overtime Markets. Good luck!

discount-vault.title: Discount Vault
discount-vault.description: Buys positions that have more than {{odds}} odds and are available at a discount larger than {{discount}}.
discount-vault.risks: The vault has an utilization rate of {{utilizationRate}} which ensures no more than {{utilizationRate}} of deposited to a round is put to risk. Furthermore, out of those {{utilizationRate}} a maximum of {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}} can be spent on a single market, thus diversifying the risk into multiple markets that have odds more than {{odds}}.

degen-discount-vault.title: Degen Discount Vault
degen-discount-vault.description: Buys positions at any odds that are available for more than {{discount}} discount.
degen-discount-vault.risks: The vault has an utilization rate of {{utilizationRate}} which ensures no more than {{utilizationRate}} of deposited to a round is put to risk. Furthermore, out of those {{utilizationRate}} a maximum of {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}} can be spent on a single market.

upsettoor-vault.title: Upsettoor Vault
upsettoor-vault.description: Buys positions that have less than {{odds}} odds and are available at a discount larger than {{discount}}.
upsettoor-vault.risks: The vault has an utilization rate of {{utilizationRate}} which ensures no more than {{utilizationRate}} of deposited to a round is put to risk. Furthermore, out of those {{utilizationRate}} a maximum of {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}} can be spent on a single market, thus diversifying the risk into multiple markets that have odds less than {{odds}}.

safu-discount-vault.title: Safu Discount Vault
safu-discount-vault.description: Buys positions that have more than {{odds}} odds and are available at any discount.
safu-discount-vault.risks: The vault has an utilization rate of {{utilizationRate}} which ensures no more than {{utilizationRate}} of deposited to a round is put to risk. Furthermore, out of those {{utilizationRate}} a maximum of {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}} can be spent on a single market, thus diversifying the risk into multiple markets that have odds more than {{odds}}.

parlay-discount-vault.title: Parlay Discount Vault
parlay-discount-vault.description: Buys parlay tickets where each individual position in the ticket has at least a {{discount}} discount.
parlay-discount-vault.risks: The vault has an utilization rate of {{utilizationRate}} which ensures no more than {{utilizationRate}} of deposited to a round is put to risk. Furthermore, out of those {{utilizationRate}} a maximum of {{allocationLimitsPerMarketPerRound}} can be spent on a single parlay ticket per round, thus diversifying the risk into multiple parlay tickets that have a discount greater than {{odds}}.

parlay-leaderboard.title: Parlay Incentives Leaderboard
parlay-leaderboard.description: A total of <bold>{{amount}}</bold> will be distributed to the best winning parlays on a <bold>weekly basis</bold>. The tickets will be ranked based on a points system. The points are calculated by taking the odds of the parlay, multiplying it with the square root of the buy-in and adding 10% bonus for each game on the ticket.
parlay-leaderboard.distribution-note: Rewards will be distributed to the <bold>TOP 20 parlays every week</bold>!
parlay-leaderboard.no-parlays: No winning parlays registered in the period yet.
parlay-leaderboard.warning: *Overtime team holds the right to disqualify wallets we suspect of gaming the system.
parlay-leaderboard.warning2: Users that have covered 50% or more of potential combinations of their winning tickets will be disqualified.
parlay-leaderboard.deprecated-info: Period 26 is the last one with Parlay Leaderboard incentives. Stay tuned for the new incentives soon!

ticket-info.title: Parlay leaderboard
ticket-info.points-tooltip: Calculated total points with bonuses for parlay leaderboard. Points are derived by multiplying the total odds of the parlay with square root of the buy-in and then adding 10% bonus for each game on the ticket.
ticket-info.rank-tooltip: Tentative ranking based on current state of the leaderboard. Final ranking are known at round's end. Rounds are weekly Wednesday to Wednesday.
ticket-info.rewards-tooltip: Potential rewards if your parlay assumes the rank above at round's end.

liquidity-pool.title: Provide Liquidity
liquidity-pool.description:
Description

Liquidity providing involves users depositing stablecoin collateral into a smart contract-based liquidity pool for Overtime trading. The collateral deposited is used to facilitate trading on Overtime's AMM.

At the end of each round, the proportional share of that round's PnL will be added to your deposited balance.

If you wish to withdraw, you can signal that at any time during the ongoing round, and at the end of the round the amount you signaled for withdrawal (inclusive of that round's PnL) is sent to you. The minimum amount to be withdrawn is set to 10%

Providing liquidity exposes you to various risks including potential losses due to users winning in trading as well as smart contract security risks. Please make sure you understand these risks before depositing.

TIP-99 has more details on the technical implementation of Overtime liquidity providing.
liquidity-pool.description-parlay:
Description

Liquidity providing involves users depositing stablecoin collateral into a smart contract-based liquidity pool for Overtime trading. The collateral deposited is used to facilitate trading on Overtime's Parlay AMM.

At the end of each round, the proportional share of that round's PnL will be added to your deposited balance.

If you wish to withdraw, you can signal that at any time during the ongoing round, and at the end of the round the amount you signaled for withdrawal (inclusive of that round's PnL) is sent to you. The minimum amount to be withdrawn is set to 10%

Providing liquidity exposes you to various risks including potential losses due to users winning in trading as well as smart contract security risks. Please make sure you understand these risks before depositing.

TIP-142 has more details on the technical implementation of Overtime liquidity providing.
liquidity-pool.variables:
Variables

  • Max total deposit: {{maxAllowedDeposit}}
  • Max users in the pool: {{maxAllowedUsers}}
  • Minimum deposit: {{minDepositAmount}}
  • Round duration: {{roundLength}} days

vaults.title: Overtime Markets Vaults: Automated Trading
vaults.description: Deposit assets into the Overtime Markets vault and let our automated trading mechanism deploy a strategy you choose.

parlay-leaderboard.title: Overtime Markets: Earn Parlay Rewards Every 2 Weeks
parlay-leaderboard.description: Overtime Markets is a web3 sportsbook with the best biweekly bonuses on the market for parlay players! Check out the leaderboard and if you qualified here.

referral.description: Refer a friend to Overtime Markets and get a percentage from each trade of the person you refer, paid in USD collateral instantly and directly into your wallet.

banner.arb-distribution-message: Win more than $280,000 in bonus earnings on Overtime! Click here to find out how
banner.v2-text: <bold>Overtime V1 is officially deprecated now!</bold> If you are a SportsAMM and/or ParlayAMM liquidity provider on Overtime V1 or you have deposits in Overtime V1 vaults, we kindly request that you signal a withdrawal so that your deposits does not sit idle in the legacy pools/vaults. <v2Link>Click here</v2Link> to try out V2 with the new UI, live markets & much more.

promotions.title: Promotions and Incentives
promotions.description: Overtime Markets regularly offers you various types of kickbacks, rewards, and similar incentives on Optimism, Arbitrum, and Base. You can use this page to keep track of ongoing promotions and see how you can qualify for them. Good luck!
promotions.no-promotions: Oops! It looks like there are no promotions available at the moment for given filter.
